instructions: Coat grill-and-serve skillet with nonstick cooking spray; place on grill. Cook the onion, red pepper, mushrooms and garlic in oil over medium heat until crisp-tender, about 6-8 minutes. Remove skillet from grill. Stir in the basil, salt and pepper.
ingredients: 1 medium onion, cut into thin wedges
title: Three-Veggie Skillet
